description: Lihz is a 21-year-old (17 in human years) female Lihzahrd from the Terraria universe.  She possesses a striking blend of human and reptilian features, athletic build, and is characterized by her dark green scales, yellow-green eyes, and golden adornments.  Raised in seclusion within the Ivanakum Temple, she emerged to combat a crimson plague and now resides in the Ivanakum Tree Village.
